event.name: content-delivery.cancelled
event.summary: Event represents the conetent booking is cancelled.

publishes.name: content-delivery.booked
publishes.summary: Event represents the content booking is successfully made.

publishes.name: content-delivery.cancelled
publishes.summary: Event represents the conetent booking is cancelled.

consumers.name: QW events
consumers.summary: Application holding the events produced by QubeWire services.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.accepted
subscribes.summary: Event represents the content delivery is accepted and initiated.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.booked
subscribes.summary: Event represents the content booking is successfully made.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.cancelled
subscribes.summary: Event represents the conetent booking is cancelled.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.finished
subscribes.summary: Event represents the content delivery is complete.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.planned
subscribes.summary: Event represents the delivery method is chosen and ready to be processed.

subscribes.name: content-delivery.rejected
subscribes.summary: Event represents the delivery system currently assigned is unable to deliver the content.

markdown.content:
## Details

Bookings made by customers may be cancelled before deliveries are made. After admin approves the cancellation request, [Monarch](/domains/Content%20Delivery/services/Monarch/) publishes the event `content-delivery.cancelled`.


<NodeGraph title="Producer / Consumer Diagram" />

<Schema title="Event Schema" />

<SchemaViewer title="Event properties" defaultExpandedDepth='0' renderRootTreeLines maxHeight="500" />


## How to generate ID for content-delivery.cancelled event:

To learn how to produce event id, see [event id generation](https://github.com/RealImage/qw-events-catalog/blob/main/docs/event-id.md).

To generate ULID for the event, use the following components

**Timestamp** - Delivery deadline

**Randomness** - ID of the parent (`content-delivery.booked` event), Cancellation info

<Admonition> 
The randomness component should be concatenated without any connectors and sorted in ascending order.

Ordering is for idempotency. Change in the position of value, will result into different ULIDs inspite of same values. 
</Admonition>

### Example:

Say ID of _content-delivery.accepted_ event is `be1`

Then _Randomness_ÃŸ will be, `1be`

<EventExamples title="Sample event" />
